name: Top Hotel Chania

reviews.text: Went to top hotel in June 2010. Had a very nice stay at the hotel. Lived in a two room apartment in the top floor with a balcony fronting the ocean. The hotel offered everything we needed: A great pool. A great children’s pool. A small playground. A great view. No noisy discos near by. Besides that the hotel staff was very friendly and we had a lot of fun with Sophia and the rest of the staff.
reviews.title: Super value, service and location!

aka: Top Hotel Chania Kato Stalos, Crete
